thread.title: RB Leipzig wonderkid Timo Werner has no interest in Liverpool or Bayern Munich switch
thread.title_full: RB Leipzig wonderkid Timo Werner has no interest in Liverpool or Bayern Munich switch

author: Alex Smith
title: RB Leipzig wonderkid Timo Werner has no interest in Liverpool or Bayern Munich switch
text:
RB Leipzig wonderkid Timo Werner has no interest in Liverpool or Bayern Munich switch The German has netted 14 times in 24 games to earn the attention of European's elite Share Werner isn't keen on a move (Photo: REUTERS)     
Timo Werner has ruled out a summer move to Liverpool or Bayern Munich . 
RB Leipzig striker Werner had been touted for a move to the two European giants - with Tottenham a long-term admirer. 
He claims he wants to continue his development out of the limelight and highly rated boss Ralph Hasenhuttl. 
"I want to keep growing together with RB Leipzig and keep developing here," the striker told Welt am Sonntag. Werner has netted 14 times this campaign (Photo: AFP/Getty) The 21-year-old is in high demand (Photo: REUTERS) 
"I am still only 21 years old and still have plenty of years ahead of me. 
"I am very happy at Leipzig. Joining this club has been a stroke of luck. I have found my way again under Ralph Hasenhuttl." 
Werner only joined the Bundesliga surprise package last summer in an Â£8m switch from Stuttgart. 
He was called up to the Germany senior squad for the first time last week and could make his debut against England on Wednesday. Werner wants to stay with Leipzig (Photo: Getty) Video Loading Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now
